data.name: WeHaveAlreadyMetMessage
data.value: It seems to me that we have already been through this, perhaps you have already sent that command before. _Déjà vu_

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value: Hello! As you may already know, this bot will help you with the tracking of your [Flypack](https://www.flypack.com.do) packages.\n_This bot does not have any legal relationship with the company Flypack or its associates._

data.name: SendUsernameAndPasswordMessage
data.value: Please send me your username and password, so I can monitor your packages and their status. Don't worry, I'll keep your credentials safe.\n\nSend them this way: _username, password_.

data.name: SendUsernameAndPasswordSecondMessage
data.value: Please send me your username and password.\n\nSend them like this: *username, password*, using a comma (,) in between.

data.name: WrongUsernameAndPasswordMessage
data.value:
*Wrong username and password*
Please send me your username and password one more time.

Send them this way: _username, password_.

data.name: AlreadyLoggedInWithThatAccountMessage
data.value: Hmm... odd, apparently someone has already logged in with that account. Give me some time while I figure this out.

data.name: LoginWelcomeMessage
data.value: Hi {0}! I was able to log in with your user, now I will monitor the status of your packages.

data.name: LoginAttemptRequestPermissionMessage
data.value: Hey {0}, the user {1} is trying to login with your Flypack account, are you ok with this?

data.name: DeniedLoginAttemptMessage
data.value: Sorry... your login attempt was denied.

data.name: AllowedLoginAttemptMessage
data.value: Your login attempt has been approved.

data.name: ChangeYourPasswordWarningMessage
data.value: ⚠️ I would advise you to change your password as soon as possible.

data.name: StopBotConfirmationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop the bot?

data.name: StoppedBotMessage
data.value: From this moment you will no longer receive notifications about your packages. At the same time, the information related to your user has been deleted.

data.name: StoppedBotFollowUpMessage
data.value: Also, the users that you have previously authorized have been removed and will no longer receive notifications.

data.name: StoppedBotAuthorizedUsersMessage
data.value: From this moment you will no longer receive notifications about the packages associated with the FLY-{0} account. The original logged in user has stopped the bot's functions.\nYou can log in yourself using the /start command.
